name: Fish Out of Water (AdamSeslar)
description:
FishOutofWater is a 2d platformer. The underlying story is about a salmon who eggs are stolen away and therefore she is forced to go on land and take them back. Now you must traverse the terrain even though you are completely out of your element and stick out like a sore thumb. 

You can use the A and D keys or arrow keys to move.

You can use the space bar to jump.

Alternatively you can use a controller, the left analog will move and the north button will jump.

This game was made for the Make-A-Level GameJam 2020.

Thank you to the hosts and sponsors for putting this on:)

I Hope you enjoy playing as much as i enjoyed making it.
